title: Satisfaction
description: You can't start a fire without a spark ...My billionaire boss, Bryce Clark, wanted one week -- just the two of us -- to prove to me that our feelings for each other are real, to convince me that I love him just as much as he loves me.But I'm married with two children, and it's not until my husband, Rick, confesses to cheating with a work colleague many years ago that I agree to spend that week with Bryce. But things aren't always as they seem.Rick and Bryce have made an arrangement.And I'm about to find out what it is.
author: K.M. Golland
